saved-lists.title: My Saved Lists
saved-lists.description: Organize your favorite news and content to read later
saved-lists.read_later_description: Content saved to read at another time
saved-lists.no_lists: You haven't created any lists yet
saved-lists.name: Name
saved-lists.public_list_info: Public lists can be viewed by any user
saved-lists.about_description: Lists allow you to organize your favorite news and articles for easy access later.
saved-lists.about_read_later: Save content to read at another time.
saved-lists.tip_1: Use 'Favorites' to save articles you love.
saved-lists.tip_2: Use 'Read later' for content you want to review later.
saved-lists.tip_3: Create themed lists to organize content by interests.
saved-lists.tip_4: Make your lists public to share them with others.
saved-lists.list_tip_1: Add notes to articles to remember why you saved them.
saved-lists.list_tip_2: Delete articles from the list when you've read them.
saved-lists.list_tip_3: Sort articles by date or votes according to your preferences.
saved-lists.sharing_private_info: Private lists can only be viewed by you.
saved-lists.add_posts_instruction: Explore content and use the save button to add articles.
saved-lists.notes_placeholder: Write your personal notes about this article here...
saved-lists.delete_warning: Are you sure you want to delete the list '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
saved-lists.clear_warning: Are you sure you want to delete all articles ({count}) from the list '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
saved-lists.access_list_info: You can manage all your custom lists from your profile in the "Saved > My lists" section.
saved-lists.new_list_info: You can add more content to this list at any time and manage it from your profile.
